biotools.summary: ARADEEPOPSIS is a software tool that enables plant researchers to non-invasively score plant growth, biomass accumulation and senescence from image data in a highly parallelized, high throughput, yet easy to use manner.

bioschemas.name: ARADEEPOPSIS
